casebody.data:
Isaac ZIMMERMAN, Appellant,
v.
CROSSROADS COMMONS, LTD., LLC; Crossroads Commons Management, L.L.C.; Peccole-Nevada Corporation; Peccole Nevada Corporation; Sports Chalet; and Sports Chalet, L.L.C.; Sport Chalet, LLC ; and Sport Chalet, Respondents. No. 79187 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED AUGUST 23, 2019

DISMISSED.
